column1: Little Goat Diner////We ordered the Little Piggy Went to China and the Bulls Eye French Toast
column2: and both were awesome.  Super flavorful
column3: and a great size.  Probably could have combo-ed a side with these to split
column5: so missed out on some delicious looking hashbrowns
column6: but was happy not to be too stuffed on my way out!  Great spot
